verses.verse: You are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall not <S%H1413>cut<s%> yourselves, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> any <S%H7144>baldness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For you are an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to himself, above <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> that are on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8441>abominable<s%> thing.
<S%H2063>These<s%> are the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H7794>ox,<s%> the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H5795>goat,<s%>

The <S%H354>hart,<s%> and the <S%H6643>roebuck,<s%> and the <S%H3180>fallow<s%> <S%H3180>deer,<s%> and the <S%H689>wild<s%> <S%H689>goat,<s%> and the <S%H1788>pygarg,<s%> and the <S%H8377>wild<s%> <S%H8377>ox,<s%> and the <S%H2169>chamois.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> that <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and <S%H8157>separates<s%> the <S%H8156>cleft<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6541>claws,<s%> and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> that you shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of them that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H8156>cloven<s%> <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> as the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and the <S%H768>hare,<s%> and the <S%H8227>coney:<s%> for they <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divide<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> therefore they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

And the <S%H2386>swine,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> yet chews not the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you: you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>carcass.<s%>
<S%H2088>These<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that have <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat:<s%>
And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> has not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> you may not <S%H398>eat;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
Of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>
But <S%H2088>these<s%> are they of <S%H834>which<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>ossifrage,<s%> and the <S%H5822>ospray,<s%>
And the <S%H7201>glede,<s%> and the <S%H344>kite,<s%> and the <S%H1772>vulture<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the <S%H1323>owl,<s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the <S%H8464>night<s%> <S%H8464>hawk,<s%> and the <S%H7828>cuckow,<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
The <S%H3563>little<s%> <S%H3563>owl,<s%> and the <S%H3244>great<s%> <S%H3244>owl,<s%> and the <S%H8580>swan,<s%>
And the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> and the <S%H7360>gier<s%> <S%H7360>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%>
And the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H1744>lapwing,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H5775>flies<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you: they shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
But of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>anything<s%> that <S%H5038>dies<s%> of itself: you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is in your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> it; <S%H176>or<s%> you may <S%H4376>sell<s%> it to an <S%H5237>alien:<s%> for you are an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

You shall truly <S%H6237>tithe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>corn,<s%> of your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flocks;<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> be too <S%H7235>long<s%> for you, so that you are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it; or <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> be too <S%H7368>far<s%> from you, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you:

Then shall you <S%H5414>turn<s%> it into <S%H3701>money,<s%> and <S%H6887>bind<s%> up the <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>bestow<s%> that <S%H3701>money<s%> for <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>lusts<s%> after, for <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> or for <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> or for <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or for strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> or for <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7592>desires:<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> you, and your <S%H1004>household,<s%>
And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> you shall not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him; for he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you.

At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shall <S%H3240>lay<s%> it up within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> <S%H3588>(because<s%> he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you,) and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6213>do.<s%>
